title: Learning Solutions Conference & Expo
description: This conference, organized by The eLearning Guild, focuses on e-learning and instructional design. It offers practical solutions and strategies for creating effective online learning experiences.

title: International Conference on Education
description: ICED is an international conference that brings together educators, researchers, and policymakers to discuss current trends and research in education. Topics range from pedagogy to curriculum development

title: Harvard Institutes for Higher Education
description: These institutes, offered by Harvard University, provide professional development for higher education administrators and faculty. Topics include leadership, teaching and learning, and institutional management.

title: Online Learning Consortium Accelerate
description: OLC Accelerate is an annual conference focused on online and digital learning in higher education. It explores online teaching and learning strategies, technology integration, and best practices.

title: Teach For All Global Conference
description: Teach For All's conference gathers educators, advocates, and leaders from around the world to discuss educational equity and innovations in teaching and leadership.

title: EdSurge Fusion Conference
description: he EdSurge Fusion Conference brings together educators, administrators, and edtech innovators to discuss the latest trends and challenges in education technology.
